descriptionModels.description: You can reroll a saving throw that you fail. If you do so, you must use the new roll. You shall use this feature 1 time between long rests
You can reroll a saving throw that you fail. If you do so, you must use the new roll. You shall use this feature 2 times between long rests
You can reroll a saving throw that you fail. If you do so, you must use the new roll. You shall use this feature 3 times between long rests
